Hello,

i'm using heritrix 3.0 to try to crawl some sites i want to later f=
eed
into my apache lucene/solr search engine. as i'm not interesting in
cre=
ating a surfable archive i just want to download text mime-types. On
the do=
cumentation i was able to find out how to specify the source (i
refer to th=
e NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule set with the following
property values: d=
ecision: REJECT usePresetPattern: CUSTOM regexp:
.*(/|\.html)$). What i wan=
t instead is to download any text/* mime-types
(i don't want video or image=
s or data files) for pdfs, doc, odt too.

Any idea?

Thanks
